description: Restarts selected nodes of a previous partially completed workflow run and resumes the workflow run. The selected nodes and all nodes that are downstream from the selected nodes are run.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the workflow to resume.

parameters.name: RunId
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow run to resume.

parameters.name: NodeIds
parameters.description: A list of the node IDs for the nodes you want to restart. The nodes that are to be restarted must have a run attempt in the original run. (string) ---

nested_items.name: RunId
nested_items.description: The new ID assigned to the resumed workflow run. Each resume of a workflow run will have a new run ID.

nested_items.name: NodeIds
nested_items.description: A list of the node IDs for the nodes that were actually restarted.
